original_text: You are like blind people, but you show other people which way to go. You carefully take a small fly out of your water so that you do not drink it. But then you drink the large animal that is swimming in it!
korean_text: 맹인 된 인도자여 하루살이는 걸러 내고 낙타는 삼키는도다

sentences.original_text: but you show other people which way to go
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 사람들에게 갈 길을 보여준다

sentences.original_text: You carefully take a small fly out of your water
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 물에서 작은 파리를 조심스럽게 건져낸다

sentences.original_text: so that you do not drink it
But then you drink the large animal
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그러고 나서 너희는 큰 동물을 마신다
